Key Match Events: India beat Sri Lanka by 43 runs
Riyan Parag reeled off the last Sri Lankan wickets off the first two balls of the last over
Axar Patel dismissed Pathum Nissanka in the 15th over
Riyan Parag took two wickets in the last over
Axar Patel took two wickets in an over
Arshdeep Singh got the breakthrough wicket of Kusal Mendis
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and chose to bowl first
Sri Lanka went with five bowlers
Selectors showed faith in Shubman Gill
Rahul Dravid's message for Gautam Gambhir
Post-Match Reflections: India's new era begins with a resounding win
India came back from the dead against South Africa in the previous match
India stayed on the money despite big hits and misfields
Miscellaneous Highlights: National anthems were played before the match
